title: I can't track my Wife's pixel 3. It says "location turned off" on Find my device app.
content: I cannot find my wife's Google pixel 3 when I track location using find my device app. Most of the time it says" location not found. " Occasionally though it will show the correct location. I have checked all the settings as per Google recommendation and these are all correct. I haven't checked this but I wonder if the devices location is turned off when the screen is locked??
